mapper.sql: Id, Name, CreateTime, Uptimestamp, DataState, AreaId, UnitId, PersonNum
mapper.insert: insert into t_seatinfo (Id, Name, CreateTime, Uptimestamp, DataState, AreaId, UnitId, PersonNum) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

Id,

mapper.update:
update t_seatinfo
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Uptimestamp = #{uptimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DataState = #{dataState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AreaId = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UnitId = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PersonNum = #{personNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_seatinfo set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uptimestamp = #{uptimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataState = #{dataState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AreaId = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UnitId = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PersonNum = #{personNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_seatinfo c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.Name like concat ('%', #{name},'%')
